title: Oru Poiyavadhu Sol Kannae Lyrics Jodi
stanzas:
oru poiyavadhu sol kannae
un kadhalan naanthaan endru
antha sollil
antha sollil uyir vaazhven
antha sollil uyir vaazhven

oru poiyavadhu sol kannae
un kadhal naanthaan endru
antha sollil uyir vaazhven (2)

pookkalil unnal satham
adi mounathil unnaal yutham
ithai thaanguma yen nenjam
ithai thaanguma yen nenjam

penmayum menmayum
pakkam pakkam thaan
romba pakkam pakkam thaan
paarthaal rendum ondru thaan

paalukum kallukkum
vannam ondru thaan
paarkkum kangal ondu thaan
undaal rendum vaeru thaan

oru poiyavadhu sol kannae
un kadhal naanthaan endru
antha sollil uyir vaazhven

iravinai thiratti......
iravinai thiratti
kanmaniyin kural seithaano
kanmaniyin kural seithaano
nilavin oli thiratti
kangal seithaano..

vinmeen vinmeen kondu
viralil nagam samaithu
minnalin keettrugal kondu
kairegai seithaano

vaadai kaattru pattu
vayathukku vantha
pookkal kondu
thangam thangam
poosi thoal seithaano

aanaal pennae
ullam kallil seithu vaithaano
kadhal kannae
ullam kallil seithu vaithaano

oru poiyavadhu sol kannae
un kadhal naanthaan endru
antha sollil uyir vaazhven (2)

nilavinai eduthu
arugil kaattiyathu neethaanae
arugil kaattiyathu neethaanae
malarin mugavarigal
sonnthum neethaane..

oh..kaatru bhoomi vaanam
kadhal pesum megam
arimugam seithathu yaar yaar
en anbe neethaanae

gangai gangai aattrai
kavithaigal kondu tharum
kaveri oottrai kayil
thanthaval neethane

aanaal penne
nenjai mattum moodi vaithaaye
kaadhal kanne
nenjai mattum moodi vaithaaye

oru poiyavadhu sol kannae
un kadhal naanthaan endru
antha sollil uyir vaazhven (2)

antha oru oru oru oru sollil
antha oru oru oru oru sollil
naan uyir vaazhven
uyir vaazhven
antha sollil antha sollil
antha sollil antha sollil
sollil antha sollil uyir vaazhven
uyir vaazhven
uyir vaazhven
